name: Color by Number: Calm Art
description:
Happy coloring!
Feel like there's nothing to do in your free time?
Color by Number: Calm Art will give you infinite fun and you simply can't stop!

Color by Number: Calm Art is a brand new coloring game, absolutely free to play. Color by Number: Calm Art Games provides a relaxing and calm experience for both adults and children, who can get pleasure from the vast amount of artworks and improve their aesthetic sensibility.

Covering various categories, up to three thousand colorful and gorgeous pictures are waiting for you to fill up. Animals, landscapes, architecture, flowers, national customs, characters, fairy tales, and other different categories take you into a fantastic painting world.

Simply tap to color the blanks by number and start your collecting journey!



Key Features:

- Vast amount of attractive pictures covering various themes, including mandala, animals, flowers, scenery, people, fantasy, and fairy tales.

- Daily updating artworks, all for free!

- Simple and easy to understand, one minute to get started. Just color by numbers!

- No need for a pencil and paper, anyone can paint by number any time.

- Calm and beautiful music available for your coloring.

- Color and share with your friends with a tap!



Everyone has the potential to be an artist, don’t hesitate to begin your painting!

If you need any help with Color by Number: Calm Art or want to provide suggestions, please send an email to baileechan3@gmail.com

We have been committed to providing high-quality products and services to our players. Thank you for your support and help.
